mapper.select: select id, user_pwd as userPwd, user_name as userName, birthday, welfare, user_role as userRole, user_sex as userSex, user_photo as userPhoto, user_phone as userPhone, is_delete as isDelete, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from t_user_info where is_delete = 0 order by id desc limit #{dataNum}, #{limit};
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_info (user_pwd, user_name, birthday, welfare, user_role, user_sex, user_photo, user_phone, create_time, update_time) values (#{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{birthday}, #{welfare}, #{userRole}, #{userSex}, #{userPhoto}, #{userPhone}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
